room_title: Escape room "Gettysburg Address Heist" by Escape Gettysburg in Gettysburg
review: Did the Gettysburg Heist room. It was awesome! This was our first ever escape room and it was great. Challenging enough, and escaping with the Gettysburg Address felt so rewarding! Staff was friendly and helpful. Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Gettysburg Address Heist" by Escape Gettysburg in Gettysburg
review: We were on vacation in Gettysburg and decided to check out the local escape room scene. This was our 16th room. The location was convenient and easy to find and the owner and staff were great. The Gettysburg Address Heist Room was challenging, which is great for veteran escape room players. We will definitely be back to try another room.
